name: Xeewolf [Web]
description:
MSG-PRI-01 > The enemy have overrun our position and have us surrounded. Fly the Xeewolf and we will make our last stand.

MSG-PRI-01 > GO! GO! GO!

< MSG-ENDS

The Xeewolf is an experimental stealth attack helicopter armed with AA missiles, rockets and a heavy auto-cannon.
